definition: to flow together/confluence (of rivers, airflow, roads)/(international) cooperation
to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]

sentences.english: Bus routes and railways, both overground and underground, converged on the station.
sentences.chinese: 公共汽車線路和地上地下路軌都在該站交匯。

sentences.english: A September sunrise greets Mount Colden's summit.
sentences.chinese: 九月日出與冷山山峯交匯。

sentences.english: Lu Lu pattern (six black keys and six white keys) keyboard is the outcome of the syncretism of Eastern and Western civilizations.
sentences.chinese: “律呂式鍵盤”是東西方文明交匯融合的產物。

sentences.english: The hotel is conveniently located at the junction of Jingyang Road and West Ring Road right in the center of Luyuan District.
sentences.chinese: 酒店地處於綠園區中心的景陽大路與西環城路交匯處。

sentences.english: We will seek and expand convergll1g interests with other countries.
sentences.chinese: 中國將繼續尋求和擴大同世界各國的利益交匯點。

sentences.english: The panoramic view of the Mangkang County Mangkang County is the interchange of the south and north Sichuan-Tibet lines.
sentences.chinese: 《芒康縣全景》芒康縣也是川藏南北線進藏的交匯處。

sentences.english: Mangdan Garden of Ethnic Lifestyles and Customs has been a meeting place of multi-cultural features.
sentences.chinese: 芒旦民族風情園是一個多元文化交匯的地方。

sentences.english: The traditional measurement is completed by a multiple-site joint way.
sentences.chinese: 傳統的光學測量方法是採取多站交匯方法完成測量。

sentences.english: Till the dawn break upon those mingled seas.
sentences.chinese: 直到黎明在交匯的海洋上綻迸。

sentences.english: Then move your eyes back up to meet theirs and smile demurely.
sentences.chinese: 然後再次和他們眼神交匯，正經地笑着。

sentences.english: Prions act in the place where chemistry and geometry intersect.
sentences.chinese: 普里安處於化學與幾何學交匯之處。

sentences.english: There is one bus station on the corner of Huanghe Road and Wusi Road.
sentences.chinese: 在黃河路和五四路交匯處的拐角上有一個汽車站。

sentences.english: At last they turned off the big river into a little side river that came down to join it.
sentences.chinese: 最後他們劃離主河道轉入一條與大河交匯的小支流。

sentences.english: The modern research find that the pulse at Cunkou is a multi-dimensional information convergence point.
sentences.chinese: 現代研究發現，寸口脈是一個多維信息的交匯點。

sentences.english: Main Street runs perpendicular to Pine Street, and they meet at the city library.
sentences.chinese: 梅因街和松樹街垂直交匯，路口就是市立藏書樓。

sentences.english: Meeting of cold and warm air in southern China causes heavy rain in there in spring.
sentences.chinese: 冷暖空氣的交匯，加強了華南地區春季的降水。

definition: to link/to join/to attach/connection/a link (on web page)
to encounter/to rendezvous/to converge/to meet (a payment)
to flow/to circulate/to go from place to place/to be mobile/(of assets) liquid
along the line (e.g. railway)/the region near the line
to run through/a connecting thread from beginning to end/to link
